title: Did Larry Walters Fly in a Lawn Chair Attached to Helium Balloons?
subtitle: The image of a man soaring three miles above Los Angeles in a makeshift "aircraft" has captured the imagination of the internet for decades.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: A man soared three miles above Los Angeles in an "aircraft" consisting of an aluminum lawn chair tethered to helium weather balloons.
